title: Trans doctor left 'upset and afraid' by nurse
description: Dr Beth Upton described being left in tears after the confrontation in a hospital changing room.

title: Trump ally Musk is remaking government - but will they clash?
description: Musk has emerged as a dominant force in Trump's second term, gutting an agency and issuing ultimatums to staff.

title: Trump signs order banning transgender women from female sports
description: He says the move, which covers non-elite levels, restores fairness but human rights advocates have condemned it.

description: He says the move, which covers non-elite levels, restores fairness but human rights advocates have condemned it.

title: Changing room row nurse denies comparing trans doctor to rapist
description: Sandie Peggie claims being made to get changed beside a trans woman amounted to unlawful harassment.

title: Tribunal hears NHS changing room trans row case
description: Sandie Peggie was suspended after complaining about sharing a changing room with a transgender colleague.

title: Emilia Pérez star says she will stay in Oscars race despite row
description: Karla Sofía Gascón sparked controversy over old social media posts about Islam, George Floyd and the Oscars.

title: Musk team given access to sensitive federal payment system - reports
description: The Trump administration grants Musk's team access to system that controls the flow of trillions of dollars in funds, US media report.

title: LGBT: Llanelli trans man says he locked himself away over period
description: Jay-Harley Rees says he locked himself away because he could not wear sanitary products.

title: 'My first cervical screening was over before I knew it'
description: The BBC speaks to six people about their first cervical screening, and what they wish they'd known beforehand.

title: NCAA changes policy to limit women's competition to athletes assigned female at birth
description: The change came on day after President Donald Trump signed an executive order intended to ban transgender athletes from participating in girls’ and women’s sports.

title: UPDATE: Oscar-nominated trans actor apologizes for old posts... | Denigrated Islam; Called George Floyd 'hustler'...

description: President Donald Trump has signed a flurry of executive orders focused on the military. One directs Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth to revise the Pentagon’s policy on transgender troops, likely setting in motion a future ban on their military service. Other…

title: Trump and Vance join March for Life anti-abortion activists in celebrating the movement's gains
description: President Donald Trump and his vice president, JD Vance, are celebrating gains in the anti-abortion movement with activists in the annual March for Life. Thousands came to Washington for the event Friday. After decades of fighting to overturn Roe v.…

title: Virginia attorney general drops case that accused ex-superintendent of firing teacher in retaliation
description: Virginia’s attorney general has dropped a case against a former school district superintendent who was accused of firing a teacher because she spoke out about a student inappropriately touching her. The attorney general's office said in a statement Thursday t…

title: Emilia Pérez actress Karla Sofía Gascón apologises for offensive tweets, deactivates X account
description: The Emilia Pérez star said she was 'deeply sorry to those I have caused pain'.
